spell.1: You know the word. Do you know how to spell it?
spell.2: Make your best guess and press <kbd>Enter</kbd>. The letters will change colors to give you hints.
spell.blue: Great! This is the correct letter for this position.
spell.yellow: This letter is needed, but not in this position.
spell.gray: This letter is not needed in the word.
spell.4: You got it! Now hit the green arrow or <kbd>Enter</kbd> to continue.
